BBK01.BQ1820: Central, state and local government debt - bonds

General: For Germany as a whole (western Germany up to and including 1990) From March 2009, including the debt of the Investment and Repayment Fund. From July 2009, including the debt of the Financial Market Stabilisation Fund (SoFFin).
Comment on 2009-01: From March 2009, including the debt of the Investment and Repayment Fund.
Comment on 2009-07: From July 2009, including debt of the Financial Market Stabilisation Fund (SoFFin).
